---
title: "Outcome/Treatment Type Support Matrix"
---

| Outcome     | Treatment   | [FastLeastSquares](FastLeastSquares.qmd) | [CamlCATE](CamlCATE.qmd)    |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- | ---------- |
| Continuous  | Binary      | ✅Full      | ✅Full     |
| Continuous  | Continuous  | ✅Full      | 🟡Partial[^validate]   |
| Continuous  | Categorical | ❌Not yet   | ✅Full     |
| Binary      | Binary      | ✅Full      | 🟡Partial[^validate]  |
| Binary      | Continuous  | ✅Full      | 🟡Partial[^validate]   |
| Binary      | Categorical | ❌Not yet   | 🟡Partial[^validate]   |
| Categorical | Binary      | ❌Not yet   | ❌Not yet  |
| Categorical | Continuous  | ❌Not yet   | ❌Not yet  |
| Categorical | Categorical | ❌Not yet   | ❌Not yet   |

*Notes: Multi-dimensional outcomes and treatments are not yet supported, with the
exception of multi-dimensional outcomes in FastLeastSquares.*


[^validate]: Missing `validate` method.
